#summary Install Dimmunix for Java

Download and unpack the [http://download.forge.objectweb.org/asm/asm-3.2-bin.zip ASM instrumentation framework]

Download [http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/files/Dimmunix.jar Dimmunix Java agent]

Download and unpack [http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/files/dimmunix-src.zip Dimmunix source code]

Go to the root folder of Dimmunix source code and 
 * compile Dimmunix by typing: *ant*
 * install Dimmunix by executing the following command as root: *sh install.sh*
